abstract: While financial advisers at other firms are typically free to offer a variety of investments, JPMorgan pressures brokers to sell the bank’s own products, current and former employees say.
snippet: While financial advisers at other firms are typically free to offer a variety of investments, JPMorgan pressures brokers to sell the bank’s own products, current and former employees say.
lead_paragraph: Everything is scripted for the brokers in an elite group at JPMorgan Chase: the sales pitches; the personal voice mail message; even the preferred desk candy, Glitterati Fruit & Berry.

headline.main: Selling the Home Brand: A Look Inside an Elite JPMorgan Unit
headline.print_headline: Selling the Home Brand: A Look Inside an Elite JPMorgan Unit

byline.original: By Susanne Craig and Jessica Silver-Greenberg
